Package com.intellij.application.options.schemes

Class AbstractSchemeActions<T extends Scheme>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.intellij.application.options.schemes.AbstractSchemeActions<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The actual scheme type.
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ColorSchemeActions, DescriptionAwareSchemeActions, KeymapSchemeManager

    public abstract class AbstractSchemeActions<T extends Scheme>
extends java.lang.Object

    A standard set of scheme actions: copy, reset, rename, etc. used in SimpleSchemesPanel. More actions can be added via addAdditionalActions(List) method. Available actions depend on SchemesModel. If schemes model supports both IDE and project schemes, copyToIDE(Scheme) and copyToProject(Scheme) must be overridden to do the actual job, default implementation for the methods does nothing.

    Import and export actions are available only if there are importer/exporter implementations for the actual scheme type.

    See Also:
    SimpleSchemesPanel, SchemesModel, SchemeImporter, SchemeExporter
